name: Blur Protected Content (Add-on)
author: Eighty/20 Results by Wicked Strong Chicks, LLC <info@eighty20results.com>

sections.description: Integrates with a Membership/Content protection plugin to hide protected content (encrypt & blur) with a pretty overlay & call to action.
sections.changelog:
0.8

  1. Fix: Various documentation improvements & clean up of 'dead' code
  2. Enh: Use filters & actions to add/remove content & excerpt filters for 3rd party content protection plugins
  3. Enh: Default filters & actions installed for Paid Memberships Pro
  4. Enh: Use filter to check for access rights to content in the_content filter

0.7.3

  1. Fix: Didn't display unprotected content properly.
  2. Fix: Update CSS for CTA headline
  3. Fix: Javascript for scrollToFixed and the plugin didn't load
  4. Fix: More flexibility when centering the CTA in the content.
  5. Fix: Load filter management once WP is loaded
  6. Fix: Too much space between paragraphs in default CTA form
  7. Fix: Didn't handle PMPro Excerpt and content filters well
  8. Fix: Didn't return as clean of HTML as we'd like
  9. Fix: Refactored class
  10. Fix: Login link didn't always display in 'right' position
  11. Enh: Allow CTA to scroll to top of page, then stay visible while content scrolls underneath (supports Genesis Themes)
  12. Enh: Simplify content filter handling Enh: Simplify centering CTA for blurred content
  13. Enh: Empty but protected page had CTA dropping below content.
  14. Enh: Add clear fix for CTA
  15. Enh: Simplify filter handling Enh: Change priority of excerpt & content filtering

0.7.2

  1. Fix: Didn't display unprotected content properly.
  2. Update CSS for CTA headline

0.7.1

  1. Fix: Debug logging caused fatal error
  2. Fix: Didn't include all required files in build

0.7

  1. Fix: Path to master & child theme hosted e20r-style CSS files.
  2. Enh: Add initial styling for default level(s) page in CTA
  3. Enh: Allow user to load own CSS file (stored in active theme's directory under /e20r-styles)
  4. Enh: Clean up code (don't leave unused variables, remove xdebug settings, etc)

0.5

  1. Fix: Path to update checker
  2. Enh: Update tags in readme.txt

0.4

  1. Enh: Adding build infrastructure for plugin
  2. Enh: Add plugin update checker
  3. Enh: Remove unneeded text replace.
  4. Enh: CTA headline change
  5. Fix: Paths to build environment
